stattype.comment: how to reconcile this static currency value stat with a currency system where currency values are inherently relative?
what about items with multiple spikes? and how does the player know how horny this stat is?
what to do for surface relations since the game uses these values relative to each other? presumably, once proper physics approximations are in place then that extra dimension will require relations
should a surface to volume ratio come into calculations of damage inflicted from different body parts?
for a container to be useful, it's volume often is much more than its mass
if a stat is required on wearables do its relations actually do anything? only if it is rollable on other types (which it currently is)
stattype.socketableslots: should there be different intensities according to which slot is socketed into? 0
